title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but marked as dirty by code assist
description: Bug report for issue 6410 regarding the file being marked as dirty by code assist when there are no changes made.
OB: The file is marked as dirty even though no changes have been made to it, and code assist does not appear.
EB: If code assist does not have any suggestions, it should not mark the file as dirty.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the file in the code editor.
2. Enable code assist.
3. Make sure the file is not modified.
4. Observe that the file is marked as dirty even though there are no changes.
5. Verify that code assist does not appear.
